snippet.title: Dark Deity Character Showcase
snippet.description:
In celebration of the launch of our Steam store page, we wanted to bring a glimpse of how the game is shaping up to you all - and of course a character showcase is always a fun way to do that.

It's been a while since you've seen substantial video progress, and as we get closer to launch the time between videos will shrink.

Wishlist us on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1374840/Dark_Deity/?beta=0
Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/68ca8u2
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/DarkDeityGame
Subscribe to our Subreddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/DarkDeityGame/
Like our Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/DarkDeityGame
Follow along on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/darkdeitygame/
Watch Developer Steams Tues/Thurs: https://www.twitch.tv/sna_charles
